title: Digging Up Armageddon - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/23/20
itunes:title: Digging Up Armageddon - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/23/20
description:
George Noory and Dr. Eric Cline explore his work studying archaeological digs to discover the ancient site Megiddo, that was fortified by King Solomon of the Bible, and how the collapse of that civilization may mirror a collapse of our modern society.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
